website_summaries.verdict: A convenient kitchen aid that doubles up as a storage container. Features interchangeable graters for different purposes.
pros: Grate your produce right into the storage container and use the snap on lid to keep any excess fresh while stored in the fridge
Comes with a coarse grater and fine grater
cons: Some users found this model too large to hold while grating

customer_reviews.title: Neatest thing to have in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.text: I have been struggling for years with the flat ones and 4-sided box ones, plastic ones and metal ones, the vice grip-like ones and even the pencil sharpener type ones. This is my buddy, my pal! Pro: I love that you can grate the whole bowl full and it goes in the fridge with the lid. So quick and easy and very sturdy. Clean up is easy. Cons: I would love something to keep the two graters in for storage. I don't put them in a drawer. I don't want them getting banged up. Still looking for a spot.
customer_reviews.author: Lonnie

customer_reviews.title: Clever design is essentially self storing—fits in a Not-so-deep kitchen drawer
customer_reviews.text: Just used once but I like the clever design. You can store one grater atop the red plastic cover (meant to allow you to store grated items in the fridge), and the other grater sits below the container but obviously is looser. The product info doesn’t show a picture of what I’m trying to explain here lol. But this ideal for me as it’ll fit in a kitchen drawer. And I’m sure I’ll use it for more than grating cheese.
customer_reviews.author: LT

customer_reviews.title: NOT BAD, JUST WISH IT WAS LARGER
customer_reviews.text: Conceptually speaking, this is a great idea, and a great little cheese grater, but I was expecting it to be somewhat larger, and unfortunately, its not - in fact, its not much bigger than a large grapefruit. If you're interested in grating cheese for a single taco or two, its great. But if you're preparing mozzarella for a pizza or two, its just much too small.
customer_reviews.author: Wingnut

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing and light weight
customer_reviews.text: Very light weight and flimsy. Disappointed. It’s like an item you would find at the Dollar Tree. I would not have purchased it I had seen this in person. Two grating surfaces. I actually expect it to rust soon. .
customer_reviews.author: Boxer Mom

customer_reviews.title: Best cheese grater
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about this! I've had mine for more than 10 years. Bought this one for my MIL. It is easy to grate with because it is easy to hold onto. Clean up is simple because you shredded right into your storage container.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Butler

customer_reviews.title: Great Grater
customer_reviews.text: Each of the women in my family has one of these. I just purchased this one as a wedding gift for my niece. It is so convenient to use With its own bowl to hold what you grate.
customer_reviews.author: J.P.

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: I loved the idea of how easy this may be to use. Well I was wrong. The shredder feels cheap and it is quite awkward to use.
customer_reviews.author: PD

customer_reviews.title: So easy!
customer_reviews.text: I love that it catches the grated cheese into a bowl that has it's own lid, so I can shred more than I need at the moment and use the rest later. No problem in the dishwasher either.
customer_reviews.author: Jaded121

customer_reviews.title: We had one of these years ago and I like it better than a box grater.
customer_reviews.text: This is what we use for shredded cheese. I like it because once I shred the cheese, the cheese that isn't used (leftover) I just snap the lid on and put it in the refrigerator. I don't end up having extra dishes to wash.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best!!!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a friend as I already have one and it's so nice to be able to grate cheese and it is contained and it's not all over my counter. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Carsok

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: This cheese grater is awesome. It’s easy to clean it holds 8 ounces of cheese so I can grade a whole brick and then it has a lid that I could just put it right in the refrigerator to store it. No more used baggies to hold cheese. I would recommend this to anybody who uses cheese regularly. I also don’t cut my knuckles up anymore. LOL
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best ever!!
customer_reviews.text: I like that the black holder comes with a cover if you don't use everything you just grated, you can just put it in the fridge. Looks durable
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Many great features
customer_reviews.text: I love it! It is kind to my fingers when grating, self storage and easy to use. A new modern version of this type is amazing. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Maryberger

customer_reviews.title: Best cheese grater ever!!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome I love them so much! Only downside is the bottom isn't very sticky so you really have to hang on to it.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Works wonderfully and easy to store~ I like that it is large enough but not so large that it is difficult to store.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: “Grate” Product LOL
customer_reviews.text: Grate lol product! Exactly the same as the ones once sold at IKEA.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: able to grate and store all in one!
customer_reviews.text: What's to like or dislike? just what I ordered!! Love the color too!
customer_reviews.author: James Roessler

customer_reviews.title: ok
customer_reviews.text: not very well fitting to the container. Similar to Ikea grater.
customer_reviews.author: TacoLvr

customer_reviews.title: review
customer_reviews.text: Surface area for grating is quite limited.....so not easy to use (hard to avoid making a mess). Arrived very quickly and priced very well.
customer_reviews.author: pleach

customer_reviews.title: Never buy pre shredded cheese.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product. I’ve had one for years and have ordered one for each of my 3 daughters.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Great kitchen gadget
customer_reviews.text: I was gifted one of these cheese graders and I lost the box. I loved it but never knew where it came from. Just found it!! So happy!!! No more catching shredded cheese on a paper towel!!
customer_reviews.author: mamamac

customer_reviews.title: Buy this one!  It's an awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the zester! It's quick, super effective and I don't worry about testing my fingers!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Knorr

customer_reviews.title: Fast & convenient
customer_reviews.text: Fast and convenient design... we love it. Both sizes work very well and with less of a mess to clean up.
customer_reviews.author: tttulsa

customer_reviews.title: Great grater!
customer_reviews.text: Love this grater! So much easier than a big box grater. Works well and great price.
customer_reviews.author: melissa

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping, sturdy product.
customer_reviews.text: Bigger than I expected, which is a plus. I like that there are two different size graters. Easy to use and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Kahrs

customer_reviews.title: Nada
customer_reviews.text: Love that it grates right in a container. I just wish the lid would seal tighter. But love it
customer_reviews.author: Anna R.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and clean. Handy shred & store feature.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Not what it says it is.
customer_reviews.text: I am returning this. First and foremost the description says the grater is stainless steal. If so it is the lowest quality, cheapest stainless steel. There is another reason I do not really believe this is a trustworthy product. The plastic bowl and lid does not have any information on it at all. Nothing that indicates even country of manufacture nor company that made it. Is it dishwasher safe? Microwave safe? Safe for hot liquids? Or simply just food safe? It is just a formed piece of plastic. Plastic which, for all you or I know, will leach harmful chemicals into our food. I have arrived at the conclusion that it is really cheap, potentially dangerous junk.
customer_reviews.author: Nelson E.

customer_reviews.title: Quality is better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I didn't plan on using it often, so I figured this would be a cheap buy. Quality is MUCH better than I expected, so much so that I use this grater several times a week! Two different sized graters suits pretty much any of my needs. The container is a nice touch too.
customer_reviews.author: Kemya

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: This product works great. Love to have a place to store the extra grated cheese. Trying to get away from prepackaged cheese shreds. I'll be purchasing another for the cabin.
customer_reviews.author: WassonMom

customer_reviews.title: Love the concept, needs slight tweaks
customer_reviews.text: This is not as sharp as some other graters that I have. I was hoping it would be slightly smaller to be easier to handle, and the bottom doesn't stick to the counter as well as I would like. Also, the lid doesn't snap closed easily, requires some effort. None of these are deal breakers because as a whole it works well. Just everything could be just a little bit better.
customer_reviews.author: T. Boggs

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: It is sharp and works as described but black is ugly. So the 3 instead of 5 is because of ugliness and the way the top works to cover and save grated items.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Cheese grater
customer_reviews.text: I had one like it for about 10 years. This one works fine, but it is not as sturdy as my previous one.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret D. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: I love this shredder!
customer_reviews.text: I love this shredder so much more than the standard stand up one that we had been using before. It is easy to pop in the dishwasher and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best cheese grinder
customer_reviews.text: I love how sharp it is and it comes with a lid and cheese keeps fresh several days !
customer_reviews.author: Linda S

customer_reviews.title: No Complaints
customer_reviews.text: Used it couple times now and it works just like my other one - great.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Great grater!
customer_reviews.text: Love this grater/cheese keeper. I have used it for vegetables also. Cuts well and preserves leftovers.
customer_reviews.author: AMS

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a grater that had its own container. This fit the bill great. The metal grate cuts the cheese perfectly and it has a lid for storing left over cheese. Easy to clean too.
customer_reviews.author: Kim V.

customer_reviews.title: So quick and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent grater. Best one I've ever used. It is quick and simple. No more buying bagged shredded saw dust cheese anymore!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Love my Cheese grater! Easy to use, dishwasher safe, and keep fridge organized!
customer_reviews.author: Nikkie

customer_reviews.title: Cheesy grater
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Love the container. No messes on the counter.
customer_reviews.author: sherry brown

product_meta.title: Cheese Grater Citrus Lemon Zester with Food Storage Container & Lid - Perfect For Hard Parmesan Or Soft Cheddar Cheeses, Ginger, Vegetables, Butter, Chocolate & Nutmeg (Red)
product_meta.description:
Cheese Grater Citrus Lemon Zester with Food Storage Container & Lid - Perfect For Hard Parmesan Or Soft Cheddar Cheeses, Ginger, Vegetables, Butter, Chocolate & Nutmeg

Please open a A-Z complain to Amazon, if you have place an order to these sellers:NNCTA, ElixiBam (They are selling fake products, Amazon will issue a full refund to you)

A must-have for any busy household, Hicook professional quality food and cheese grater offers the complete solution to grating, shredding and zesting your favourite cheeses, vegetables, herbs and spices. This versatile equipment is the go-to utensil for getting meal prep done at record speed. 

High-Grade Stainless Steel Construction 

Enjoy recipes such as pizazz, quesadillas, welsh rarebit, tacos, nachos and various sauces fast. Equipped with reliable, razor sharp, stainless-steel grates, and a non-slip bottom, this premium kitchen grater will quickly shred, grate and grind. Efficiently stores all grated foods instantly in container bottom for no mess. 
Comes with a secure, snap on lid so you can directly store foods in fridge, cupboard etc. Never accidentally grate your knuckles again on a box grater, or change between many different grates, this easy-to-use equipment will soon become a family favourite.

Cheese grater with container has 2 different planers.
Grate cheese straight into the container.
The airtight seal lid helps food retain its flavor and aroma longer in the container box.
High-grade stainless steel that allows it to deliver top quality results through a smooth grating experience.
Grater for hard and soft cheese, butter, chocolate, bread, lemon, oranges, various fruits, onions, carrots, potatoes, various vegetables, ginger, garlic and soap. All your daily grinding needs. 
Stainless steel grater planers are dishwasher Safe.
Keep out of reach of children.

Package Contains 1*Red Color Food saver, 2 grater planers
feature_bullets: GRATE ALL TYPES OF CHEESE - One simple cheese grater with container that will completely improve the taste and texture of what you prepare. Try it with Parmesan, Cheddar, Monterey Jack, Wisconsin, Bergenost, Colby-Jack, Edam, Locatelli, Liederkranz, Muenster and more.

RAZOR SHARP STAINLESS STEEL BLADES - Professional quality kitchen utensil that makes light work of food prep for everyone. Fine and coarse grates will cut through food like a knife. Our customers also grate cucumber, cabbage, carrots, cauliflower, onion, potato, zucchini and other vegetables.

AIRTIGHT STORAGE CONTAINER & SUPER EASY TO CLEAN - It comes with attachable container base to hold food for mess-free grating, with securely fitting snap on lid. Dishwasher safe, or easily washed with soap and water.
FINE GRINDER: Our fine grater is ideal for orange, lemon, other citrus fruits, apple, coconut, chocolate, bread, almonds, nuts, ginger, garlic, cinnamon, and other spices and herbs.
LIFETIME GUARANTEE - The Hicook Cheese Grater comes with a 100% Money Back Lifetime Guarantee. You won't get this lifetime guarantee from other big brands. Try It RISK FREE Today!
